data.title: FAMILY TREE
data.text:
This is a first attempt to compile an Allman Brothers Band family tree.

There are probably still mistakes and a lot of details have to be filled in.

Please contact me if you have corrections or additional information.

Individual family trees: THE ALLMAN BROTHERS BAND DUANE ALLMAN GREGG ALLMAN BERRY OAKLEY DICKEY BETTS BUTCH TRUCKS JAIMOE CHUCK LEAVELL LAMAR WILLIAMS MIKE LAWLER DAVID 'ROOK' GOLDFLIES 'DANGEROUS' DAN TOLER DAVID 'FRANKIE' TOLER JOHNNY NEEL ALLEN WOODY WARREN HAYNES MARC QUINONES OTEIL BURBRIDGE JACK PEARSON DEREK TRUCKS JIMMY HERRING
